resources.string:
HTML stands for Hyper Text Markup Language 

HTML describes the structure of a Web pages 

HTML consists of a series of elements 

HTML elements tell the browser how to display the content 

HTML elements are represented by tags

1. What is HTML? \n
2. What are TAGS?\n
3. Do all tags have an end tag?\n
4. What is formatting in HTML?\n
5. How many types of heading does an HTML contain?\n
6. How to create hyperlink in HTML?\n
7. What are some common list tags?\n
8. What are the tags to represent the data in tabular form?\n
9. How to add audio and video data on the web page?\n
10. Create a simple web page by using some common tags.
